title: Athletism — Rowing (Elite) — Phase 10: Peak & Performance Maintenance
goal: Express fitness; micro-dose intensity; keep neuromuscular sharpness.

warmup: Technical drills: pick drill / pause @ arms-only / legs-only
main: Boat: 2–3 short pieces 250–500m @race feel, full recovery
Strength: 2x2 light power pulls + MB throws
cooldown: Light stretching (Posterior chain, lats, hip flexors)

notes: Week 1: One race rehearsal + one speed tune-up. Week 2: Race week micro-taper (48–72h light).
